questions.question: Hi
questions.answer: Hello, how may I help you?

questions.question: What do you Scaffold hire rates start from?
questions.answer: This will depend upon various factors, can you provide me with some more information please?

questions.question: What are your prices
questions.answer: Prices start from £150 for an on-site quote and survey

questions.question: I need a quote for some scaffolding
questions.answer: Sure, can you privide me with some more details so I can assist you further?

questions.question: It's for an exstension on a bungalow
questions.answer: Ok! are you able to provide the size and area of the bungalow
